title: Bloomberg Markets: Gullane's Miller on Shorting Wingstop

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Richard "Trip" Miller\u0010Founder and Managing Partner\u0010Gullane Capital\u0010Discussing strategy of his long-short equity hedge fund and why he is shorting Wingstop restaurants.
